channel.title: Podcasts on plod.tv
channel.description: Recent content in Podcasts on plod.tv

item.title: My podcasts
item.description: With my new job I do a lot of commuting and during this time, and while running I listen to a lot of podcasts to keep on top of things and for self improvement. I am always looking for new podcasts and so I thought I’d share what I’m currently listening to which can hopefully help others find something useful. https://lists.pocketcasts.com/4c12f2fc-0cf5-4553-93fc-7363a14c3173 Also pocket casts is my all time favourite app so seriously check that out.
